DESCRIPTION: Configures the Auto-Addon Anti-Mass Spoilers module.
SPOILERS1: Oops! You must enter days in **Numbers**. Example: `20`
SPOILERS2:
Oops! The module option must be between 0-3.
0 = disable
1 = delete message
2 = apply a warning to the user
3 = both (1 & 2)
SPOILERS3: `[AUTO-MOD]` Anti-Mass Spoilers was successfully set to **{{args}}**.
SPOILERS6: Oops! This channel has already been added to the blacklist.
SPOILERS7: Oops! This post has already been added to the whitelist.
SPOILERS9: Oops! This user has already been added to the whitelist.
SPOILERS11: Oops! I don't seem to have permission to access this channel, or it doesn't exist. Check and try again.
SPOILERS12: `[AUTO-MOD]` <#{{channel}} has been successfully added to the whitelist.
SPOILERS13: Oops! I don't seem to have permission to access this channel, or it doesn't exist. Check and try again.
SPOILERS14: `[AUTO-MOD]` <#{{channel}} was successfully removed from the whitelist.
SPOILERS16: `[AUTO-MOD]` <@&{{role}}> has been successfully added to the whitelist.
SPOILERS17: `[AUTO-MOD]` <@&{{role}}> has been successfully removed from the whitelist.
SPOILERS19: `[AUTO-MOD]` <@{{user}}> has been successfully added to the whitelist.
SPOILERS20: `[AUTO-MOD]` <@{{user}}> has been successfully removed from the whitelist.
SPOILERS22: `[AUTO-MOD]` The Limit was changed to **{{args}}** successfully.
